verses.roman: evam eva khalu mahad-abhicārāti-kramaḥ kārtsnyenātmane phalati

synonyms: evam eva—in this way; khalu—indeed; mahat—to great personalities; abhicāra—in the form of envy; ati-kramaḥ—the limit of offense; kārtsnyena—always; ātmane—unto oneself; phalati—gives the result.
translation: When an envious person commits an offense before a great personality, he is always punished in the way mentioned above.
